createNewKind.description: Press 'K' to create a new kind with the selected objects

deleteSingleObject.description: Press 'Delete' to remove the selected object

deleteGroupOfObjects.description: Press 'Delete' to remove the selected group of objects

insertBetween.description: Press '+' to insert object between two selected objects

insert.description: Press '+' to insert object as a child of the selected object

changeRoot.description: Press 'R' to change root to the selected one
